summary: The conversation is between a customer service representative from LendingClub, a peer-to-peer lending platform, and a customer who has started lending on the platform. The representative is checking in with the customer to see if they have any questions or concerns regarding their lending activities.
customer_concerns: - The customer is not able to understand the exact breakdown of their returns from lending on the platform.
questions_asked: - The customer did not ask any specific questions.
overall_sentiment: Neutral. The customer did not express any strong positive or negative sentiment, but rather seemed to have a straightforward, informational exchange with the representative.
